import React, { useState, use } from 'react' import AlertContext from '../../context/alert/alertContext' const Register = () => { const alertContext = useContext(AlertContext) const { setAlert } = alertContext const [user, setUser] = useState({ name:'', email:'', password: '', password2: '' }) const { name, email, password, password2 }= user const onChange = e => setUser({...user, [e.target.name] : e.target.value }) const onSubmit= e => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Register submit') } return (

Account Register

) } export default Register
